name: Kingdom Chess
description:
Kingdom Chess takes the world's most popular board game to a new level by expanding well known mechanics with countless variations.

Game is still being developed and isn't available for sale yet.
Please read Early Access description to find out what features has been implemented.
Get in touch if you wish to receive a free beta key before game is released in early access.

Complete version of the game will include:
- Numerous maps in different sizes and shapes with variety of obstacles and interactive elements.
- Dozens of new pieces with interesting movesets, fascinating abilities, rich customization and wonderful animations.
- New game modes strike with tactical twists to provide new and addictive strategic opportunities.
- Up to 4 player, casual or competitive battles in local / online multiplayer or against challenging AI at different levels.
- Unique art style where low poly and blocky world is rich in detail and appealing to an eye.
- Relaxing music will comfort your mind and immerse in medieval / fantasy setting.
- Challenging puzzles offer short and engaging entertainment.
- Friendly tutorial teaches you how to play chess even if you're never played before.
- Campaign expands single player experience by adding rpg and strategy layers over core mechanics in open world along with interesting story.
- Easy and intuitive editor allows players to create and share their own scenarios with the community.
